Short title: Section 5001 of D.C. Law 19-168 provided that subtitle A of title V of the act may be cited as "Department of Mental Health Enterprise Fund Establishment Amendment Act of 2012".

DC CODE § 7-1131.21

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: There is established as a nonlapsing fund the Department of Mental Health Enterprise Fund ("Fund") into which shall be deposited all fees, proceeds, and revenues collected from the activities and operations of a food cafeteria managed and operated by the Department of Mental Health to serve department staff and patients on the Saint Elizabeths Hospital campus, which funds shall be used only for the management and operation of the food cafeteria.

All funds deposited into the Fund, and any interest earned on those funds shall not revert to the unrestricted fund balance of the General Fund of the District of Columbia at the end of a fiscal year, or of any other time, but shall be continually available for the uses and purposes set forth in subsection (a) of this section without regard to fiscal year limitation, subject to authorization by Congress.
